basics.name: Dr. Shravan Mohan
basics.label: Applied Scientist
basics.summary: Professional with 14 years of rich & diverse industrial research experience in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Operations Research, Signal Processing and Control Systems. Hold a B.Tech, M.Tech and Ph.D in Electrical Engineering from IIT Madras.

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: Lead researcher developing algorithms for large scale entity matching using fine-tuned LLMs, optimal ranking of entities on multiple criteria, and binary time-series forecasting.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: Led a multi-faceted role with major contributions in robotic warehouse simulation, deep learning optimization, split learning, and LLM development.
highlights: Developed large scale robotic warehouse simulator with multi-agent path finding
Designed low-memory and low-power deep learning models
Designed optimal peer-to-peer split learning topologies
Developed finetuning and efficient training methods for LLMs
